page.title: 20Keymer Road shops
page.content: There are 53 shops in Keymer Rd., Hassocks between the station and Adastra park. 159 people are employed in these shops. 95 of them live in Hassocks or Keymer as well as work there. The types of shops are as follows: Food shops: Hairdressers: No:9 No:3 Restaurants/Cafes: Garages: No:1 No:2 Newsagents/Stationary: Banks: No:3 No:4 The oldest shop is Eastwood's. The Post Office has the largest number of staff, which is 31 and they are all full time. 22 of them live in Hassocks and Keymer.
